ARABIC: وَكَانَ فِى ٱلْمَدِينَةِ تِسْعَةُ رَهْطٍ يُفْسِدُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا يُصْلِحُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: There was a group of nine men in the city causing corruption in the land and not putting things right.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: There were in that city nine persons who spread disorder in the land, and did not reform.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Now there were nine ring-leaders in the city who created corruption in the land and never worked to set things right.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: There were nine tribes in the city spreading evil without any reform in the land.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And there were nine persons in the city who used to cause turmoil in the land and did not wish reform.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And there were in the city nine Rahtin, who made mischief in the land, and would not reform.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And there were in the city nine persons who made mischief in the land and did not act aright.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Now in the city there were nine persons who did corruption in the land, and put not things right;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And there were in the city nine persons who made mischief in the land and reformed not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: There were in the city nine men who spread corruption in the land, and would not reform.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And there were nine of a group in the City, who spread corruption in the land and rectified not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: There were nine persons in the city who caused corruption in the land and did not set things right.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: There were in the city nine men of a family, who made mischief in the land, and would not reform.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And there were in the city nine men (from the sons of their chiefs), who made mischief in the land, and would not reform.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: In the city there were nine people who were corrupting the land and did not reform.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: In the city was a gang of nine who made mischief in the land and did no good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And there were in the city nine family heads causing corruption in the land and not amending [its affairs].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [27:48] And there were in the city, the city of Thamūd, a band of nine men, that is, [nine] men, who were causing corruption in the land, with acts of disobedience, which included their corroding of dinar and dirham coins [rendering them worthless], and did not reform [their ways], through obedience [to God].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And there were in the city nine persons) nine sinful people among the sons of their chieftains: Qaddar Ibn Salif, Masda' Ibn Dahw and their host (who made mischief in the land) through their transgressions (and reformed not) they did not enjoy righteousness nor practised it.
